markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Noxious Vapors](/Spells.aspx?ID=704)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You emit a cloud of toxic smoke that temporarily obscures you from sight. Each creature except you in the area when you Cast the Spell takes 1d6 poison damage (basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically fails the saving throw also becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). All creatures in the area become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all creatures outside the smoke become concealed to creatures within it. This smoke can be dispersed by a strong wind.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Noxious Vapors

text: Noxious Vapors Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 222 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 10-foot emanation Saving Throw basic Fortitude Duration 1 round --- You emit a cloud of toxic smoke that temporarily obscures you from sight. Each creature except you in the area when you Cast the Spell takes 1d6 poison damage (basic Fortitude save). A creature that critically fails the saving throw also becomes sickened 1. All creatures in the area become concealed, and all creatures outside the smoke become concealed to creatures within it. This smoke can be dispersed by a strong wind. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.
